paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider the periodic neural networks with variable coefficients and time-varying delays, and investigate the existence of periodic solution and its global exponential stability. Various sufficient conditions ensuring the existence of periodic and its global exponential stability are given. The results obtained in this paper extend and generalize those given in previous literature. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Global exponential stability of periodic neural networks with time-varying delays
